:py:mod:`wgertrainer.display_muscle_table`
==========================================

.. py:module:: wgertrainer.display_muscle_table


Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   wgertrainer.display_muscle_table.display_muscle_table



.. py:function:: display_muscle_table()

   Display a table of muscle IDs, names, and English names using pandas.

   This function retrieves muscle data, sorts it by ID, and prints a table of
   muscle information.

   .. rubric:: Example

   display_muscle_table()

   :returns: None
